rev.desc.rev.desc: On the project.new panel, set the Project Using Labels parm to true, which allows for cm3 paging to properly project the fields.
Will no longer update the current Change or task with page number or number of pages.
No longer sets date.entered to tod() on set.new.vars.
Modified turn.trigger.off to refresh $L.file prior to updating it.
Changed exit on set.page.sql to init.page so that $L.file does not get reselected.

Rewrote CM paging routine so that page and total.pages are no longer preset in the change record and projected to the new page. Instead the last record is selected to determine what the page numbers should be.

descript.descript: On the project.new panel, set the Project Using Labels parm to true, which allows for cm3 paging to properly project the fields.
Will no longer update the current Change or task with page number or number of pages.
No longer sets date.entered to tod() on set.new.vars.
Modified turn.trigger.off to refresh $L.file prior to updating it.
Changed exit on set.page.sql to init.page so that $L.file does not get reselected.

Rewrote CM paging routine so that page and total.pages are no longer preset in the change record and projected to the new page. Instead the last record is selected to determine what the page numbers should be.
Sets $EXIT to "nosave" on a failed page add.
